name: mini-machines
author: Kryzeth
title: Mini Machines Mod
description: Miniature versions of assemblers, electric furnaces, etc. Full integration with all of Bobs mods and ShinyBobGFX, Factorio Extended Plus, Gotlag's Electric Furnaces, Optera's Storage Tank MK2, AAI Industry, Krastorio, Industrial Revolution, and Fantario. (independently, not necessarily simultaneously)
